name: Firefox theme: Miyu [Fx 29+/Linux]
description: A glossy theme with full lightweight theme/Personas compatibility. Updated from style 39806 for Firefox 29 and above, now with color customization. Tested on Linux, and to a lesser extent Windows 7; untested on other Windows versions and macOS/OS X. Some Windows platform testing done under Wine 1.9.x.
additional_info:
Known issues:
* Windows 7 - When the system title bar is hidden, the window control buttons (close, minimize, maximize) are blacked out.
* Windows 7 - When the window is maximized, part of it may go offscreen.

2016-08-15:
* Tabs now touch the top of the screen in fullscreen mode, allowing you to just throw the mouse to the top of the window and select a tab.

2016-08-26:
* Customization of background color added.
* Slightly improved appearance on Windows platforms.

2016-08-29:
* Slightly improved appearance on Windows.

2016-08-30:
* Renamed from Miyu to Glassy Simple.

2016-09-01:
* Menubar text color improved.
* Renamed back to Miyu.
* Added custom menubar styling as an option.
* Made custom menubar look less awful.

2016-10-20:
* Further improved appearance on Windows.
